# Homeostasis Imbalance {#homeostasis-imbalance}

A dysfunction in Ca<sup>2+</sup> homeostasis can be caused by neuroinflammation, specifically reactive astrocytes [@wangAdvancesNeuroinflammation2024]. 

Over time, this can lead to the development of [amyotrophic lateral sclerosis]({{< var ref-amyotrophic-lateral-sclerosis.path >}}) [@wangAdvancesNeuroinflammation2024].
